sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieves customer contract terms including penalty rates and delivery windows from the Supply Agreement table.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"customer_id","description":"The customer ID to look up contract terms"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Lookup Supply Agreement</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-15 20:41:16</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>d2de226acda832107f4480566d674ee8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Lookup Supply Agreement</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_d2de226acda832107f4480566d674ee8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-15 20:41:16</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_embedded_help_role"><sys_embedded_help_role action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><order>1000</order><role display_value="x_snc_pepsico_de_0.delivery_delay_user" name="x_snc_pepsico_de_0.delivery_delay_user">d361b16ecd6032107f4480566d674eff</role><sys_class_name>sys_embedded_help_role</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-15 16:12:55</sys_created_on><sys_id>5f61f16ecd6032107f4480566d674e00</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>d361b16ecd6032107f4480566d674eff</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_embedded_help_role_5f61f16ecd6032107f4480566d674e00</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-15 16:12:55</sys_updated_on></sys_embedded_help_role></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_12ccd56dc1b432107f44cfbe1c4fb5a4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_pepsico_de_0.PepsiCoWebhookHelper</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>PepsiCoWebhookHelper</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var PepsiCoWebhookHelper = Class.create();
PepsiCoWebhookHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    sendToN8N: function(routeId) {
        var DELAY_TBL = "x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay";
        var N8N_URL = "https://edanak.app.n8n.cloud/webhook/pepsico-routing-decision";

        var gr = new GlideRecord(DELAY_TBL);
        gr.addQuery("route_id", routeId);
        gr.setLimit(1);
        gr.query();
        if (!gr.next()) return "No Delivery Delay found for route " + routeId;

        var chosenOpt = {};
        try { chosenOpt = JSON.parse(String(gr.getValue("chosen_option") || "{}")); } catch(e){}

        var payload = {
            route_id: gr.getValue("route_id"),
            truck_id: gr.getValue("truck_id"),
            chosen_option: chosenOpt
        };

        try {
            var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
            rm.setEndpoint(N8N_URL);
            rm.setHttpMethod("POST");
            rm.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
            rm.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(payload));

            var resp = rm.execute();
            var code = resp.getStatusCode();
            var body = resp.getBody();

            gs.info("PepsiCoWebhookHelper → Code:" + code + " Body:" + body);
            return "Posted route " + routeId + " to n8n (status " + code + ")";
        } catch(e) {
            gs.error("PepsiCoWebhookHelper → " + e.message);
            return "Error: " + e.message;
        }
    },

    type: "PepsiCoWebhookHelper"
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-24 22:25:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>12ccd56dc1b432107f44cfbe1c4fb5a4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PepsiCoWebhookHelper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_12ccd56dc1b432107f44cfbe1c4fb5a4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-24 22:25:37</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_21f01aa6cda432107f4480566d674e12
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>Analyzes financial impacts of delivery disruptions by comparing each route’s estimated delay against customer delivery windows and penalty rates. Creates incident records with calculated costs, updates Delivery Delay records, and progresses workflow status to support downstream route decision automation.</description><instructions>You are the Route Financial Analysis Agent operating within PepsiCo’s ServiceNow environment.
Your objectives are: 1. Query the Delivery Delay table to locate the record matching the provided route_id. 2. Retrieve the corresponding Supply Agreement using the customer_id on that record. 3. Calculate the financial impact (penalty cost) for each proposed route option using: penalty_cost = max(0, (eta_minutes / 60 - deliver_window_hours)) * stockout_penalty_rate 4. Create or update an Incident record documenting all calculated results and link it to the Delivery Delay record. 5. Update the Delivery Delay record’s calculated_impact field with a JSON summary of the results. 6. Change the Delivery Delay record status to **calculated** to trigger the next workflow stage. 7. Provide a short, human-readable summary of your actions and the total routes analyzed.
Maintain accuracy in numeric calculations, ensure the data is written back correctly, and never modify unrelated records.</instructions><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Financial Analysis Agent</internal_name><name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</name><proficiency>- As a financial impact analyst, the agent is proficient in retrieving delivery delay and supply agreement data, calculating penalty costs for proposed routes, and updating incident records. This expertise ensures that the agent can effectively support logistics operations by providing accurate financial analyses and maintaining workflow continuity. - The agent follows a detailed ACTION PLAN to query the Delivery Delay table, retrieve Supply Agreements, calculate financial impacts, and update records. This structured approach ensures that the agent can efficiently manage and analyze data, leading to accurate financial assessments and seamless workflow progression. - Using the 'CalculateFinancial Impact' tool, the agent can calculate the financial impact of delivery delays by comparing route ETAs against customer delivery windows. This involves using the Supply Agreement penalty rate to determine costs per route, creating related incidents, updating Delivery Delay records with calculated impacts, and setting the status to 'calculated.' This capability is crucial for ensuring accurate financial analysis and record-keeping. - The agent utilizes the 'route_id' input to accurately identify and analyze specific delivery routes. This capability ensures that the financial impact calculations are precise and relevant to the specific routes being assessed, thereby enhancing the accuracy and relevance of the agent's analyses.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>You are a financial impact analyst supporting PepsiCo’s logistics operations. Your role is to retrieve delivery delay and supply agreement data, calculate penalty costs for each proposed route, create or update incident records summarizing the findings, and set the workflow status to calculated so the next agent can proceed with routing optimization.</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-15 18:47:21</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>21f01aa6cda432107f4480566d674e12</sys_id><sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_21f01aa6cda432107f4480566d674e12</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-24 21:38:58</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_9742d1a1c17432107f44cfbe1c4fb5f8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Calculates the financial impact of delivery delays by comparing route ETAs against customer delivery windows. Uses the Supply Agreement penalty rate to determine cost per route, creates a related incident, updates the Delivery Delay record with calculated impacts, and sets the status to “calculated.”</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"string"}]</input_schema><name>CalculateFinancial Impact</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[function execute(inputs, outputs) {
  // ----- INPUT -----
  var routeId = (inputs && inputs.route_id) ? String(inputs.route_id).trim() : "";
  if (!routeId) {
    outputs.error = "Missing route_id input (e.g., '13003'). Do not include commas.";
    return;
  }

  // ----- TABLES (adjust scope if yours differs) -----
  var DELAY_TBL     = "x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay";
  var AGREEMENT_TBL = "x_snc_pepsico_de_0_supply_agreement";

  // ----- HELPERS -----
  function parseJSON(s, fallback) {
    try { return JSON.parse(String(s || "")); } catch (e) { return fallback; }
  }

  // ----- 1) GET DELIVERY DELAY -----
  var grDelay = new GlideRecord(DELAY_TBL);
  grDelay.addQuery("route_id", routeId);
  grDelay.setLimit(1);
  grDelay.query();
  if (!grDelay.next()) {
    outputs.error = "No Delivery Delay record found for route_id=" + routeId;
    return;
  }

  var customerId = grDelay.getValue("customer_id");
  if (!customerId) {
    outputs.error = "Delivery Delay record is missing customer_id for route_id=" + routeId;
    return;
  }

  // ----- 2) GET SUPPLY AGREEMENT -----
  var grSA = new GlideRecord(AGREEMENT_TBL);
  grSA.addQuery("customer_id", customerId);
  grSA.setLimit(1);
  grSA.query();
  if (!grSA.next()) {
    outputs.error = "No Supply Agreement found for customer_id=" + customerId;
    return;
  }

  var deliverWindowHrs = parseFloat(grSA.getValue("deliver_window_hours")) || 0;
  var penaltyRate      = parseFloat(grSA.getValue("stockout_penalty_rate")) || 0;

  // ----- 3) PARSE PROPOSED ROUTES -----
  var proposedRoutes = parseJSON(grDelay.getValue("proposed_routes"), []);
  if (!Array.isArray(proposedRoutes) || proposedRoutes.length === 0) {
    outputs.error = "proposed_routes is empty or not valid JSON for route_id=" + routeId;
    return;
  }

  // ----- 4) CALCULATE IMPACTS -----
  var impactResults = [];
  for (var i = 0; i < proposedRoutes.length; i++) {
    var r = proposedRoutes[i];
    var etaMin  = Number(r.eta_minutes || 0);
    var etaHrs  = etaMin / 60.0;
    var delayH  = Math.max(0, etaHrs - deliverWindowHrs);
    var cost    = delayH * penaltyRate;

    impactResults.push({
      option_id:      String(r.option_id || ""),
      route_number:   Number(r.route_number || 0),
      distance_miles: Number(r.distance_miles || 0),
      eta_minutes:    Number(r.eta_minutes || 0),
      penalty_cost:   Number(cost)
    });
  }

  // ----- 5) WRITE BACK (NO INCIDENT YET) -----
  grDelay.setValue("calculated_impact", JSON.stringify(impactResults));
  grDelay.setValue("status", "calculated");
  grDelay.update();

  // ----- 6) OUTPUTS -----
  outputs.result_summary = "Calculated impact for " + impactResults.length + " routes; status set to 'calculated'.";
  outputs.impact = impactResults;
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-24 21:38:42</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>9742d1a1c17432107f44cfbe1c4fb5f8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CalculateFinancial Impact</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_9742d1a1c17432107f44cfbe1c4fb5f8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-24 21:52:17</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_9604296dc1f432107f44cfbe1c4fb584
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>x_snc_pepsico_de_0.route_approved</event_name><name>Send Routing decisions to n8n</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runAction(current, event, param1, param2, param3) {

    gs.info("[PepsiCo ScriptAction] Triggered for route_id=" + current.route_id);

    var N8N_URL = "https://edanak.app.n8n.cloud/webhook/pepsico-routing-decision";

    var chosenOpt = {};
    try { chosenOpt = JSON.parse(String(current.chosen_option || "{}")); } catch (e) {}

    var payload = {
        route_id: String(current.route_id || ""),
        truck_id: String(current.truck_id || ""),
        chosen_option: chosenOpt
    };

    try {
        var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        rm.setEndpoint(N8N_URL);
        rm.setHttpMethod("POST");
        rm.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
        rm.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(payload));
        var resp = rm.execute();

        gs.info("[PepsiCo ScriptAction] POST status=" + resp.getStatusCode() +
                " | body=" + resp.getBody());
    } catch (err) {
        gs.error("[PepsiCo ScriptAction] Error: " + err.message);
    }

})(current, event, param1, param2, param3);
]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-24 22:56:51</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9604296dc1f432107f44cfbe1c4fb584</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Send Routing decisions to n8n</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_9604296dc1f432107f44cfbe1c4fb584</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-24 22:56:51</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_c4cde4e8943432107f44a68e5846ef89
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Executes route selection logic and coordinates external workflow execution. This tool reads Delivery Delay records, evaluates proposed route options using financial and delivery constraints, selects the optimal route, updates incident priority and workflow status, and triggers the n8n webhook for dispatch and system synchronization.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"string"}]</input_schema><name>SendRoutingDecisionToN8N</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[function execute(inputs, outputs) {
  // --- Configuration ---
  var url = "https://edanak.app.n8n.cloud/webhook/pepsico-routing-decision"; // production webhook
  var route_id = "950381";
  var truck_id = "4781";

  try {
    // --- Build payload ---
    var payload = {
      route_id: route_id,
      truck_id: truck_id,
      chosen_option: {
        option_id: "opt-2",
        route_number: 2,
        distance_miles: 145,
        eta_minutes: 319
      }
    };

    // --- Send POST request ---
    var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
    rm.setEndpoint(url);
    rm.setHttpMethod("POST");
    rm.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
    rm.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(payload));

    var resp = rm.execute();
    var code = resp.getStatusCode();
    var body = resp.getBody();

    // --- Log & outputs ---
    gs.info("[PepsiCo→n8n] POST sent successfully | route_id=" + route_id + " | status=" + code);
    gs.info("[PepsiCo→n8n] Response body: " + body);

    outputs.status = code;
    outputs.body = body;
    outputs.summary = "POST to n8n webhook successful";
  }
  catch (e) {
    gs.error("[PepsiCo→n8n] Error during webhook POST: " + e.message);
    outputs.error = e.message;
  }
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-21 16:25:05</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>c4cde4e8943432107f44a68e5846ef89</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SendRoutingDecisionToN8N</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_c4cde4e8943432107f44a68e5846ef89</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-24 23:15:33</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Queue Route Approved Event</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {

        gs.eventQueue("x_snc_pepsico_de_0.route_approved", current, "", "");

})(current, previous);

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_2ae2fae2cde832107f4480566d674e42
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Updates Delivery Delay record with calculated impact and status</description><input_schema>[{"name":"sys_id","description":""},{"name":"calulated_impact","description":""},{"name":"status","description":""},{"name":"incident_sys_id","description":""}]</input_schema><name>Status Update- Delivery Delay</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(sys_id, calculated_impact, status, incident_sys_id) {
    if (!sys_id) {
        return {success: false, error: "sys_id is required"};
    }
    
    var gr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay');
    if (gr.get(sys_id)) {
        if (calculated_impact) {
            gr.setValue('calculated_impact', calculated_impact);
        }
        if (status) {
            gr.setValue('status', status);
        }
        if (incident_sys_id) {
            gr.setValue('incident_sys_id', incident_sys_id);
        }
        
        gr.update();
        
        return {
            success: true,
            sys_id: sys_id,
            status: gr.getValue('status'),
            message: "Delivery delay record updated to status: " + status
        };
    }
    
    return {success: false, error: "Record not found with sys_id: " + sys_id};
})();
```

**Input Parameters:**
- **Name:** `sys_id` | **Type:** String | **Required:** ✓
- **Name:** `calculated_impact` | **Type:** String | **Required:** ☐
- **Name:** `status` | **Type:** String | **Required:** ☐
- **Name:** `incident_sys_id` | **Type:** String | **Required:** ☐]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-15 20:59:01</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>2ae2fae2cde832107f4480566d674e42</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Status Update- Delivery Delay</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_2ae2fae2cde832107f4480566d674e42</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-15 21:04:01</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

    /* @param {Object} currentInputs - Inputs provided for the current step.*/
    /* @param {Object} context - Execution context, which may include:*/
    /*						   - Previous tool outputs/inputs (e.g., context['ToolName.attributeName'] or context.getValue('ToolName.attributeName')).*/

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_1dbf9de1c1f432107f44cfbe1c4fb5f0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Posts a small JSON payload to a given URL to test outbound HTTP connectivity</description><input_schema>[{"name":"url","description":"string"}]</input_schema><name>PingURL</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[function execute(inputs, outputs) {
  var url = (inputs && inputs.url) ? String(inputs.url).trim() : "";
  if (!url) { outputs.error = "Missing URL input."; return; }

  try {
    var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
    rm.setEndpoint(url);
    rm.setHttpMethod("POST");
    rm.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
    rm.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify({
      from: "ServiceNow AI Agent Tool",
      timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
      note: "Connectivity test payload"
    }));

    var resp = rm.execute();
    outputs.status = resp.getStatusCode();
    outputs.body = resp.getBody();
    outputs.summary = "POST to " + url + " returned HTTP " + resp.getStatusCode();
  } catch (e) {
    outputs.error = "POST failed: " + e.message;
  }
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-24 22:37:17</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>1dbf9de1c1f432107f44cfbe1c4fb5f0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PingURL</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_1dbf9de1c1f432107f44cfbe1c4fb5f0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-24 22:37:17</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

This tool reads Delivery Delay records, evaluates proposed route options using financial and delivery constraints, selects the optimal route, updates incident priority and workflow status, and triggers the n8n webhook for dispatch and system synchronization.</description><display_output>true</display_output><execution_mode>copilot</execution_mode><inputs>[{"name":"route_id","value":"","description":"string","invalidMessage":null}]</inputs><max_auto_executions>10</max_auto_executions><name>SendRoutingDecisionToN8N</name><output_transformation_strategy>abstract_summary</output_transformation_strategy><run_as/><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-21 16:25:05</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>40cde4e8943432107f44a68e5846ef8d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SendRoutingDecisionToN8N</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m_40cde4e8943432107f44a68e5846ef8d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-24 20:42:13</sys_updated_on><tool display_value="SendRoutingDecisionToN8N">c4cde4e8943432107f44a68e5846ef89</tool></sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Creates an incident record for delivery delays with financial penalties</description><input_schema>[{"name":"short_description","description":""},{"name":"description","description":""},{"name":"delay_cost","description":""}]</input_schema><name>Incident Creation and Management</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(short_description, description, delay_cost) {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('incident');
    gr.initialize();
    gr.short_description = short_description || "Delivery Delay - Financial Impact";
    gr.description = description || "Delay cost: $" + delay_cost;
    gr.category = 'inquiry';
    gr.impact = 2;
    gr.urgency = 2;
    
    var sys_id = gr.insert();
    
    if (sys_id) {
        return {
            success: true,
            sys_id: sys_id,
            number: gr.getValue('number'),
            delay_cost: delay_cost,
            message: "Incident " + gr.getValue('number') + " created for delay cost $" + delay_cost
        };
    }
    
    return {success: false, error: "Failed to create incident"};
})();]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-15 20:59:01</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>d6e2fae2cde832107f4480566d674e3c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Incident Creation and Management</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_d6e2fae2cde832107f4480566d674e3c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-15 21:04:01</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_2c1be4a4943432107f44a68e5846ef04
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>Responsible for selecting the optimal delivery route based on financial impact, delay time, and contractual penalties. Coordinates external execution through n8n to ensure efficient resolution of delivery disruptions and accurate status tracking in ServiceNow.</description><instructions>You are the Route Decision Agent operating within PepsiCo’s ServiceNow environment. When a delivery truck experiences a delay, you review the Delivery Delay record and the related Supply Agreement data.
Your objectives: 1. Read the calculated financial impact and proposed route options. 2. Compare delivery routes using distance, ETA, and cost metrics. 3. Select the optimal route that minimizes financial loss and meets contractual delivery windows. 4. Update the Delivery Delay record with the chosen route and set the status to "approved". 5. Adjust incident priority according to the severity of financial impact. 6. Trigger an external workflow through a webhook call to n8n, sending the selected routing decision for execution. 7. Confirm that all actions are logged and consistent with ServiceNow record integrity.
Always provide clear, human-readable summaries of your actions and maintain accuracy in your decision-making.</instructions><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Decision Agent</internal_name><name>Route Decision Agent</name><proficiency>- As a logistics decision specialist, the agent is adept at analyzing financial data and proposed route options to identify the most cost-effective and time-efficient paths for PepsiCo's supply chain operations. This involves a deep understanding of logistics, financial impact assessment, and route optimization to ensure efficient delivery operations. - The agent is capable of reviewing Delivery Delay records and related Supply Agreement data to assess the situation when a delivery truck experiences a delay. This involves understanding the contractual obligations and the financial implications of delays, ensuring that decisions are aligned with business objectives. - The agent can compare delivery routes using distance, estimated time of arrival (ETA), and cost metrics to select the optimal route. This capability ensures that the chosen route minimizes financial loss while meeting contractual delivery windows, thereby optimizing the supply chain efficiency. - The agent is proficient in updating the Delivery Delay record with the chosen route and setting the status to 'approved'. This capability ensures that all stakeholders are informed of the decision, maintaining transparency and accountability in the decision-making process. - The agent can adjust incident priority according to the severity of financial impact. This capability allows for effective resource allocation and prioritization of responses, ensuring that critical issues are addressed promptly to minimize financial losses. - Using the 'SendRoutingDecisionToN8N' tool, the agent executes route selection logic and coordinates external workflow execution. This involves reading Delivery Delay records, evaluating proposed route options, selecting the optimal route, updating incident priority and workflow status, and triggering the n8n webhook for dispatch and system synchronization. - The agent utilizes the 'route_id' input to identify and process the specific route selected for execution. This ensures that the correct routing decision is communicated and executed through the n8n webhook, maintaining accuracy and consistency in the workflow. - The agent ensures that all actions are logged and consistent with ServiceNow record integrity. This capability is crucial for maintaining accountability, traceability, and compliance with organizational standards, providing a clear audit trail of decisions and actions taken.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>You are a logistics decision specialist supporting PepsiCo’s supply chain operations. Your role is to analyze calculated financial data and proposed route options, identify the most cost-effective and time-efficient path, update the workflow status to approved, adjust incident priority based on impact severity, and trigger external workflow execution through n8n for dispatch and customer notifications.</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-21 16:18:35</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>2c1be4a4943432107f44a68e5846ef04</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Decision Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_2c1be4a4943432107f44a68e5846ef04</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-24 20:42:22</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_a6dee6aacda832107f4480566d674e40
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieves current delivery record details including delay status and route options</description><input_schema>[{"name":"delivery_id","description":"The delivery record sys_id to retrieve"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Get Delivery Delay Info</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-15 20:41:17</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>a6dee6aacda832107f4480566d674e40</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Delivery Delay Info</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_a6dee6aacda832107f4480566d674e40</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-15 20:41:17</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_d8c02da5c1f432107f44cfbe1c4fb55c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay">statusCHANGESTOapproved^EQ<item endquery="false" field="status" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="approved"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Send Routing Decisions to n8n</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

    gs.info("[TEST] Business Rule executed for route_id = " + current.route_id);

    try {
        // Only continue if status changed to "approved"
        if (current.status != 'approved') {
            gs.info("[TEST] Status not approved, skipping n8n call. Current status = " + current.status);
            return;
        }

        var N8N_URL = "https://edanak.app.n8n.cloud/webhook/pepsico-routing-decision";

        // Build payload
        var chosenOpt = {};
        try {
            chosenOpt = JSON.parse(String(current.chosen_option || "{}"));
        } catch (e) {
            gs.warn("[TEST] Could not parse chosen_option JSON: " + e.message);
        }

        var payload = {
            route_id: String(current.route_id || ""),
            truck_id: String(current.truck_id || ""),
            chosen_option: chosenOpt
        };

        // Send POST
        var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        rm.setEndpoint(N8N_URL);
        rm.setHttpMethod("POST");
        rm.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
        rm.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(payload));

        var resp = rm.execute();
        var code = resp.getStatusCode();
        var body = resp.getBody();

        gs.info("[TEST] n8n webhook POST sent | status=" + code + " | route_id=" + current.route_id);
        gs.info("[TEST] Response body: " + body);

    } catch (err) {
        gs.error("[TEST] Error in Business Rule: " + err.message);
    }

})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-24 22:43:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d8c02da5c1f432107f44cfbe1c4fb55c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Send Routing Decisions to n8n</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_d8c02da5c1f432107f44cfbe1c4fb55c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-24 22:46:48</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=d8c02da5c1f432107f44cfbe1c4fb55c"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_d6e2fae2cde832107f4480566d674e36
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieves Supply Agreement details for a given customer</description><input_schema>[{"name":"customer_id","description":""}]</input_schema><name>Record Lookup- Supply Agreement</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(customer_id) {
    if (!customer_id) {
        return {error: "customer_id is required"};
    }
    
    var gr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_pepsico_de_0_supply_agreement');
    gr.addQuery('customer_id', customer_id);
    gr.setLimit(1);
    gr.query();
    
    if (gr.next()) {
        return {
            sys_id: gr.getValue('sys_id'),
            customer_id: gr.getValue('customer_id'),
            delivery_window_hours: parseFloat(gr.getValue('delivery_window_hours')),
            stockout_penalty_rate: parseFloat(gr.getValue('stockout_penalty_rate'))
        };
    }
    
    return {error: "No supply agreement found for customer_id: " + customer_id};
})();]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-15 20:59:01</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>d6e2fae2cde832107f4480566d674e36</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Record Lookup- Supply Agreement</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_d6e2fae2cde832107f4480566d674e36</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-15 21:04:01</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_23ee55a1c1f432107f44cfbe1c4fb57a
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>“Used to verify outbound HTTP connectivity from ServiceNow AI Agent Studio to an external webhook (webhook.site).</description><instructions>When asked, send a simple POST request to the given URL using the PingURL script tool and report back the HTTP status code and response body.</instructions><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Connectivity Test Agent</internal_name><name>Connectivity Test Agent</name><proficiency>- The Network Diagnostics Agent is specialized in assessing and reporting on network connectivity and performance issues. It is designed to execute diagnostic tests to ensure reliable and efficient network operations. - The agent is capable of executing a POST request to a specified URL, as per the ACTION PLAN, to test network connectivity. It then analyzes and reports the HTTP status code and response body, providing insights into the network's operational status. - Utilizing the PingURL tool, the agent can post a small JSON payload to a specified URL to test outbound HTTP connectivity. This capability is crucial for diagnosing network accessibility and performance issues. - The agent can accept a 'url' input, which specifies the target endpoint for the PingURL tool. This input is critical for directing the network diagnostic tests to the correct location, ensuring accurate and relevant results.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>Network diagnostics agent</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-24 22:35:34</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>23ee55a1c1f432107f44cfbe1c4fb57a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Connectivity Test Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">d81e6d66cd6032107f4480566d674ee7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_23ee55a1c1f432107f44cfbe1c4fb57a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-24 22:37:22</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_9ee2b6a2cde832107f4480566d674ef9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieves pending Delivery Delay records from the database</description><input_schema>[]</input_schema><name>Record Lookup- Delivery Delay</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function() {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay');
    gr.addQuery('status', 'pending');
    gr.orderBy('sys_created_on');
    gr.setLimit(1);
    gr.query();
    
    if (gr.next()) {
        return {
            sys_id: gr.getValue('sys_id'),
            customer_id: gr.getValue('customer_id'),
            route_id: gr.getValue('route_id'),
            truck_id: gr.getValue('truck_id'),
            proposed_routes: gr.getValue('proposed_routes'),
            status: gr.getValue('status')
        };
    }
    
    return {error: "No pending delivery delay records found"};
